name: Manager
text: I remember you --^5 you stayed the night with us.

name: Customer
text: Thank you so much for your kindness and generosity.^9 I live in the city,^5 and I shudder to think about what might have happened to me if I had left.^9 You might have saved my life.

name: Manager
text: I'm just glad we could be a help.^9 Stay safe out there,^5 okay?
